Sr Informatics Applications Specialist plays a key role in the formation of an integrated approach to clinical and financial data reporting improvement This is an effort to create a more complete database to closely track the organizations delivery and reimbursement for care delivery functions used within the Electronic Medical Records EMR Works in highly collaborative multidisciplinary teams on various project activities in efforts to deliver a more robust and discreet data capture and is integral in application support systems configurations and customization Applications System Administrator Brattleboro Retreat Brattleboro VT April 2003 to Present Established compatibility with third party software products by developing program for modification and integration Coordinated with systems partners to finalize designs and confirm requirements Ensured network system and data availability and integrity through preventative maintenance and upgrades Provided documentation on startup shutdown and first level troubleshooting of processes to help desk staff Provided onboarding and termination documentation to help desk staff Built application platform foundation to support migration from clientserver product lines to enterprise architectures and services Continue to build custom screens and reports in the Electronic Medical Record EMR to support clinical staff in administration of patient care Developed a SharePoint Server Farm for the IT department Designed SharePoint master page and page layouts serving as the departments main SharePoint support for all technical complications Consistently meet deadlines and requirements for all production work orders Managed and participated on creative projects from concept to completion while managing and collaborating with outside vendors Advocated for endusers to perform testing and problem analysis for server desktop and IT infrastructure work Application Specialist Brattleboro Retreat Brattleboro VT November 1997 to April 2003 Worked exclusively with Microsoft Office Suite Word Excel Outlook PowerPoint Publisher and Access Created and customized interactive forms using Office application with
